info.name: source_api_server
info.description: Kinetic Request CE API Web Application

info.name: source_api_username
info.description: Username for an account that has permission to use the API

info.name: source_space_slug
info.description: The space slug (can also be set as a parameter).

info.name: destination_api_server
info.description: Kinetic Request CE API Web Application

info.name: destination_api_username
info.description: Username for an account that has permission to use the API

info.name: destination_space_slug
info.description: The space slug (can also be set as a parameter).

info.name: enable_debug_logging
info.description: Enable debug logging if the value is set to 'Yes'.
